summary: This document discusses the arrest of Federal Deputy Cesar del Angel Fuentes for agitational activities in Guerrero, Mexico, in relation to a clash between rival factions of copra growers in Acapulco.
title: ARREST OF FEDERAL DEPUTY CESAR DEL ANGEL FUENTES FOR AGITATIONAL ACTIVITIES IN GUERRERO
recipient: STATE/INR NMCC/MC DIA (SECDEF JCS ARMY NAVY AIR) CIA/NMCC NIC USIA NSA OCR SDO AID ONE ORR DCS CGS
